languages.text: "Э, нет. Не выйдет никак. Никого не пускаем. Сразу говорю — подкупить-запугать меня не пытайтесь, не на того напали. Можете Наместнику прошение подать, если вам так невтерпеж. Но лучше — идите подобру-поздорову. В мире много опасных гнусных дыр, не обязательно помирать именно в этой. Вы — помирай, а нам потом лишние трупы жечь..." {n}Мужчина демонстративно отворачивается.{/n}

"No dice. Not gonna happen. We're letting no one in. I'm telling you right now, bribes and intimidation won't work on me, so don't even try. You can file a petition with the Liege if you're so desperate. But my advice to you would be to go on your merry way. The void's got plenty of nasty, dangerous holes, you don't have to die in this one in particular. You'll go in and die, and that means I'll have more corpses to burn..." {n}He pointedly turns away.{/n}

Вы — помирай, а нам потом лишние трупы жечь..." {n}Мужчина демонстративно отворачивается.{/n}

You can file a petition with the Liege if you're so desperate. But my advice to you would be to go on your merry way. This world has enough nasty, dangerous holes, you don't have to die in this one in particular. You'll go in and die, and that means I'll have more corpses to burn..." {n}He pointedly turns away.{/n}

languages.text: “想都别想，门都没有。我把话和你说清楚，我们绝对不会让任何人进去。无论你是贿赂我还是吓唬我，都没用。所以，这种事情你想都别想。如果你真的想找死，你可以去找总督提交一份请愿书，但我给你的建议是，能好好活着还是好好活着。虚空之中有很多充满危险的粪坑，你没必要非得死在这个粪坑里。如果你进去了，你必死无疑，我也有会更多的尸体要烧……”{n}他突然转过了身，离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No dice. Not gonna happen. We're letting no one in. I'm telling you right now, bribes and intimidation won't work on me, so don't even try. You can file a petition with the Liege if you're so desperate. But my advice to you would be to go on your merry way. The void's got plenty of nasty, dangerous holes, you don't have to die in this one in particular. You'll go in and die, and that means I'll have more corpses to burn..." {n}He pointedly turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “想都别想，门都没有。我把话和你说清楚，我们绝对不会让任何人进去。无论你是贿赂我还是吓唬我，都没用。所以，这种事情你想都别想。如果你真的想找死，你可以去找总督提交一份请愿书，但我给你的建议是，能好好活着还是好好活着。虚空之中有很多充满危险的粪坑，你没必要非得死在这个粪坑里。如果你进去了，你必死无疑，我也有会更多的尸体要烧……”{n}他突然转过了身，离开了。{/n}

languages.text: «Nanay. No va a pasar. Aquí no entra nadie. Y me adelanto a decirle que conmigo no valen ni los sobornos ni las amenazas. Si tantas ganas tiene de pasar, envíe una petición oficial al Señor. Aunque le aconsejo que deje estar las cosas. El vacío está lleno de agujeros infectos y no merece la pena que muera en este. Si entra ahí y muere, tendré más cadáveres que quemar...». {n}Aparta la vista ostentosamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No dice. Not gonna happen. We're letting no one in. I'm telling you right now, bribes and intimidation won't work on me, so don't even try. You can file a petition with the Liege if you're so desperate. But my advice to you would be to go on your merry way. The void's got plenty of nasty, dangerous holes, you don't have to die in this one in particular. You'll go in and die, and that means I'll have more corpses to burn..." {n}He pointedly turns away.{/n}

Si tantas ganas tiene de pasar, envíe una petición oficial al Señor. Aunque le aconsejo que deje estar las cosas. El vacío está lleno de agujeros infectos y no merece la pena que muera en este. Si entra ahí y muere, tendré más cadáveres que quemar...». {n}Aparta la vista ostentosamente.{/n}

languages.text: 「ありえません、無理です。ここへは誰も入れません。先に言っておきますが、賄賂も脅しも私には効かないので無駄ですよ。どうしてもと言うなら、領主に申し立ての手続きができます。しかしどちらかと言えば、楽な道をお選びいただきたい。虚空にはおぞましく危険な穴がいくつもありますが、特別ここで命を捨てることはありません。貴方が中に入って死ぬことになれば、私が燃やす死体が増えるではないですか…」{n}作業長はプイッと背を向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No dice. Not gonna happen. We're letting no one in. I'm telling you right now, bribes and intimidation won't work on me, so don't even try. You can file a petition with the Liege if you're so desperate. But my advice to you would be to go on your merry way. The void's got plenty of nasty, dangerous holes, you don't have to die in this one in particular. You'll go in and die, and that means I'll have more corpses to burn..." {n}He pointedly turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ありえません、無理です。ここへは誰も入れません。先に言っておきますが、賄賂も脅しも私には効かないので無駄ですよ。どうしてもと言うなら、領主に申し立ての手続きができます。しかしどちらかと言えば、楽な道をお選びいただきたい。虚空にはおぞましく危険な穴がいくつもありますが、特別ここで命を捨てることはありません。貴方が中に入って死ぬことになれば、私が燃やす死体が増えるではないですか…」{n}作業長はプイッと背を向けた。{/n}

languages.text: "Keine Chance. Das wird nicht passieren. Wir lassen niemanden rein. Ich sag's Euch gleich, Bestechung und Einschüchterungsversuche ziehen bei mir nicht, also versucht es gar nicht erst. Ihr könnt beim Lehnsherren ein Gesuch einreichen, wenn Ihr unbedingt wollt. Aber ich würde Euch raten, einfach Eures Wegs zu gehen. In der Leere gibt es viele üble, gefährliche Löcher, da müsst Ihr nicht unbedingt genau in diesem sterben. Ihr würdet reingehen und sterben, und dann müsste ich noch mehr Leichen verbrennen ..." {n}Er wendet sich demonstrativ von dir ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No dice. Not gonna happen. We're letting no one in. I'm telling you right now, bribes and intimidation won't work on me, so don't even try. You can file a petition with the Liege if you're so desperate. But my advice to you would be to go on your merry way. The void's got plenty of nasty, dangerous holes, you don't have to die in this one in particular. You'll go in and die, and that means I'll have more corpses to burn..." {n}He pointedly turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Keine Chance. Das wird nicht passieren. Wir lassen niemanden rein. Ich sag's Euch gleich, Bestechung und Einschüchterungsversuche ziehen bei mir nicht, also versucht es gar nicht erst. Ihr könnt beim Lehnsherren ein Gesuch einreichen, wenn Ihr unbedingt wollt. Aber ich würde Euch raten, einfach Eures Wegs zu gehen. In der Leere gibt es viele üble, gefährliche Löcher, da müsst Ihr nicht unbedingt genau in diesem sterben. Ihr würdet reingehen und sterben, und dann müsste ich noch mehr Leichen verbrennen ..." {n}Er wendet sich demonstrativ von dir ab.{/n}

languages.text: « Ha, dans vos rêves. C'est hors de question. On laisse entrer personne. Et je vous le dis tout de suite : les pots-de-vin et l'intimidation, ça marche pas sur moi, alors n'essayez même pas. Vous pouvez toujours déposer un recours auprès du suzerain, si vous y tenez tant que ça. Mais si vous voulez un petit conseil, passez votre chemin. Vous trouverez plein d'autres trous paumés et dangereux dans l'espace, y a pas de raison de venir mourir dans celui-ci en particulier. En plus, si vous entrez et que vous crevez, ça me fera du boulot en plus... » {n}Il vous tourne ostensiblement le dos.{/n}

You'll go in and die, and that means I'll have more corpses to burn..." {n}He pointedly turns away.{/n}

En plus, si vous entrez et que vous crevez, ça me fera du boulot en plus... » {n}Il vous tourne ostensiblement le dos.{/n}

languages.text: "Olmaz. Mümkünatı yok. İçeri kimseyi almıyoruz. Baştan diyeyim, öyle rüşvetle gözdağıyla bana söz geçiremezsiniz. Boşuna uğraşmayın yani. Başka çareniz yoksa Emîr'e dilekçe verebilirsiniz ama size tavsiyem bu işe hiç bulaşmamanız olur. Uçsuzdaki onca iğrenç, tehlikeli delik arasında burada ölmenizi gerektirecek bir durum yok. İçeri girip ölürseniz de bize yakacak fazladan ceset çıkar, o kadar." {n}Konu kapanmış gibi arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No dice. Not gonna happen. We're letting no one in. I'm telling you right now, bribes and intimidation won't work on me, so don't even try. You can file a petition with the Liege if you're so desperate. But my advice to you would be to go on your merry way. The void's got plenty of nasty, dangerous holes, you don't have to die in this one in particular. You'll go in and die, and that means I'll have more corpses to burn..." {n}He pointedly turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Maalesef, mümkünatı yok. İçeri kimse giremez. Şimdiden söyleyeyim, rüşvet ve gözdağı ile de söz geçiremezsiniz, boşuna uğraşmayın. Başka çareniz yoksa Emîr'e dilekçe verebilirsiniz ama size tavsiyem bu işe hiç bulaşmamanız olur. Uçsuzdaki onca iğrenç, tehlikeli yeri geçip burada ölmenizi gerektirecek bir durum yok. İçeri girip ölürseniz bize yakacak daha fazla ceset çıkacak o kadar." {n}Konu kapanmış gibi arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
